title: Patch Notes
content: invite her to join you at camp as the Dark Urge. Fixed Oskar Fevras acting like you'd never met if you talked to him after all his captors were killed after a previous dialogue with him had been interrupted while he was thanking you for purchasing his freedom, and if you talked to him after a previous dialogue with him had been interrupted by another player committing a crime. Zarys should now set off the explosives in the Zhentarim Hideout if you don't successfully negotiate with her. Fixed Abd
